load_all module

class load_all.HealthExperienceDistribution(**kwargs)

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model representing health and experience distribution in the game.

Variables:

  • id – int Primary key for health and experience distribution.

  • text_id – int Foreign key referencing the associated Script’s id.

  • health – int Health value associated with the distribution.

  • experience – int Experience value associated with the distribution.

  • health_enemy – int Enemy health value associated with the distribution.

Relationships:
textrelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key text_id.

experience
health
health_enemy
id
text
text_id
class load_all.LineScript(**kwargs)

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model representing a line of script in the game.

Variables:

  • id – int Primary key for the line of script.

  • text_id – int Foreign key referencing the associated Script’s id.

  • option_a_id – int Foreign key referencing the Script id for option A.

  • option_b_id – int Foreign key referencing the Script id for option B.

  • next_dialog_option_a_id – int Foreign key referencing the Script id for the next dialog option A.

  • next_dialog_option_b_id – int Foreign key referencing the Script id for the next dialog option B.

  • location_id – int Foreign key referencing the location id associated with the line of script.

Relationships:
textrelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key text_id.

option_arelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key option_a_id.

option_brelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key option_b_id.

next_dialog_option_arelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key next_dialog_option_a_id.

next_dialog_option_brelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key next_dialog_option_b_id.

locationrelationship

Relationship with the Locations table using the foreign key location_id.

location

class load_all.Script(**kwargs)

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model representing a script in the game.

Variables:

  • id (int) – Primary key for the script.

  • text (str) – The text content of the script.

id
text
load_all.insert_exp()

Insert health and experience distribution data into the database.

load_all.insert_line_script()

Insert line script data into the database.
